about_the_game:
Zombie God: a tongue-in-rotting-cheek spin on the ’God Game’ genre. Unleash your inner deity and command your undead minions!

Ever fancied yourself as a divine puppeteer of the undead? If so, then Zombie God may be the ultimate brain eating power trip. Feel the Zombie God’s power at your fingertips, overcome the pesky uninfected and watch the world rot! But be careful, the forces of the living can themselves, bite back.

Watch as the increasingly desperate humans develop new and more powerful defences to combat your green tide. From the humble patrol car to a mighty tank, the challenge will keep on increasing.

Spawn special zombies and use your unholy abilities to overcome the ever evolving defences of the doomed survivors – because who said ending the world can't be fun? Bursters explode onto the scene with a gooey finish, spitters keep their distance whilst laying down their own firepower and bulkers, whilst not outwitting anything can surely dish out the pain.

In addition to your mighty green friends the Zombie God always comes prepared, unleash torrents of goo, mutate your zombies and spread the infection brick by brick, the Zombie God can do it all.

Key Features!

  • Mix and match gameplay modifiers to create thousands of combinations in freeplay.

  • Face down the weekly Challenge Mode to truly test your skills..

  • Shamble through multiple detailed maps

  • Compete with other players to get the highest score possible

  • Unlock new customisation with each playthrough

  • Use special infected and abilities tactically to gain victory over the living

Join your fellow shamblers in worship in the official Zombie God Discord & subreddit where you will find news, updates, memes and more!

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon depictions of violence, blood & gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 5th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU / Laptop APU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i5 5th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
